subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Dario Franchitti, the Indianapolis 500 and newly crowned IndyCar Series champion, is expected to leave Andretti Green Racing for a ride with a Nascar team next season.
snippet: Dario Franchitti, the Indianapolis 500 and newly crowned IndyCar Series champion, is expected to leave Andretti Green Racing for a ride with a Nascar team next season.
